title: Brainrot Trivia Bonus Game

summary.roundStructure: 6 quick multiple-choice questions followed by an optional grand question.

rewards.perfectRoundBonus: If all 6 answers are correct, award +1 coin (7 total).

stars.bonusRoundStar: Each bonus round completion awards 1 star.
stars.threeStarChest: Collecting 3 stars grants a chest consumable at level end for bonus.
stars.deathWithThreeStars: Auto-retry level and reset stars to 0.

flow: Run 7-second timer per question; check answer or timeout.
Accumulate hidden coins; reveal only after the 6-question sequence ends.
If perfect round, add 1 bonus coin and unlock grand question.
Resolve grand question for chest reward (10 coins + 1UP) if correct.
Award star for the bonus round; grant chest + 1UP when stars reach 3.

sampleQuestions.prompt: Who is this espresso-powered dancer from brainrot lore?
What is the name of this frog-idol style character?
Which platform is most commonly credited for the viral spread of Italian brainrot edits in 2024-2025?
sampleQuestions.context: Wikipedia-style summaries describe the trend as accelerating through short-form video remix culture.

sampleQuestions.prompt: Brainrot content is typically characterized by which style element in meme culture references?
sampleQuestions.context: Wikipedia coverage of absurdist and post-ironic memes highlights chaotic repetition and intentionally low-context humor.

sampleQuestions.prompt: Silhouette challenge: who matches this blurred outline and signature hat shape?
sampleQuestions.visualHint: Heavy blur + black silhouette; only headgear and pose are readable.
